value.title: StarCraft 2: "GAME OF THE YEAR"... According to a Viewer!
value.excerpt: Two viewer submitted games in StarCraft 2. A crazy Diamond league match of Protoss versus Zerg and then a Platinum league game of Terran versus Protoss. value.title: StarCraft 2: KSL FINALS - herO Cannon Rushes Dark! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of top level StarCraft 2 between herO and Dark. This Protoss versus Zerg is one of the most chaotic games of SC2 I've recently seen. These pro gamers are team mates, friends and practice partners and it clearly shows. This series is the finals of the Korean StarCraft League, the KSL.

value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)
value.excerpt: The standard competitive mode in StarCraft 2 is 1v1. However the OlimoLeague recently put on an event where they invited three teams of progamers to face off in a 2v2 (2 vs 2) event. value.title: 6 times SC2 Pros FAILED
value.excerpt: We often think of our StarCraft 2 pros as being gods of skill, but once in a while they prove they're still human and have fails - even players like Serral, Dark, Clem and Zest! They prove they're still one of us one of us one us one of us... -- 🐷 Second Channel for Learning Resources: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom
